mc.name: Helm of Obedience

If the last card put into that graveyard this way is a creature card, sacrifice Helm of Obedience and put that card into play under your control.
mc.printedText: {X}, {T}: Put the top card of target opponent's library into his or her graveyard. Continue doing this until you have put X cards or a creature card into that graveyard, whichever occurs first.
